mapper.sql: ahd.id, ahd.item_code, ahd.item_name, ahd.min_value, ahd.max_value, ahd.unit, ahd.reference, ahd.method, ahd.order_by, ahd.fk_dict_code, ahd.value_type, ahd.is_top, ahd.date_type, ahd.personal_min_value, ahd.personal_max_value, ahd.is_auto, ahd.fk_tenant_id , ahdg.group_id, ahdg.group_name
mapper.select: SELECT ahd.item_code, ahd.item_name FROM assay_hosp_dict ahd join assay_hosp_dict_group_mapping ahdgm ON ahd.item_code = ahdgm.fk_item_code and ahd.fk_tenant_id = ahdgm.fk_tenant_id join assay_hosp_dict_group ahdg on ahdg.group_id = ahdgm.fk_group_id and ahdg.fk_tenant_id = ahdgm.fk_tenant_id WHERE ahd.fk_tenant_id = #{fkTenantId} AND ahd.date_type = #{dateType,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND ahdg.group_id is NOT NULL AND ahdg.group_name is NOT NULL order by ahd.item_name
mapper.update: update assay_hosp_dict set fk_dict_code = null where id = #{id}
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM assay_hosp_dict ahd JOIN assay_hosp_dict_group_mapping ahdgm on ahd.item_code = ahdgm.fk_item_code and ahd.fk_tenant_id = ahdgm.fk_tenant_id JOIN assay_hosp_dict_group ahdg on ahdg.group_id = ahdgm.fk_group_id and ahdg.fk_tenant_id = ahdgm.fk_tenant_id WHERE ahd.is_auto=1 AND ahd.fk_tenant_id = #{fkTenantId} GROUP BY ahdg.group_name ORDER BY ahdg.group_name
